original_title: X2000: The Collected Shorts of Francois Ozon
overview: Three naked couples sleep, make love, and awake in an empty skyscraper littered with millennium party debris in one of four provocative shorts from France's most acclaimed young director, Francois Ozon.  Segments: "Scènes de lit"/Bed Scenes/Bedtime Stories, "Action vérité"/Truth or Dare, "X2000", "La petite mort"/Little Death.
title: X2000: The Collected Shorts of Francois Ozon
